title: Pilot
summary: Successful lawyer Harvey Specter hires brilliant college dropout Mike Ross as a new associate at a top law firm despite the fact that Mike doesn't have a degree. In order to work together, both parties have to keep up the ruse to convince their coworkers that Mike is a real lawyer.

title: Errors and Omissions
summary: Mike has an ethical dilemma when Louis forces him to make a decision that could hurt his relationship with Harvey. Elsewhere, Harvey's past comes back to haunt him during a case.

title: Inside Track
summary: Harvey goes rogue in order to fix a crisis with a client despite Jessica's desire to reign him in. Elsewhere, Mike turns to Rachel for guidance when he learns he'll be hosting a dinner for rookies, an important tradition at the firm.

title: Dirty Little Secrets
summary: from the case. Elsewhere, Mike is eager to take on a pro bono case but soon learns it won't be an easy win.

title: Bail Out
summary: An old friend surfaces to ask Mike for help. Elsewhere, Harvey has a chance to close a lucrative deal or help his driver defend himself from a lawsuit.

title: Tricks of the Trade
summary: The guys defend a woman falsely accused of insider trading. Elsewhere, Mike helps Rachel study for the LSAT and realizes she's close to discovering his secret.

title: Play The Man
summary: Mike takes on Louis' protï¿½gï¿½ during a mock trial, but his conflict with Rachel could hurt his chances of winning. Elsewhere, Harvey works on a merger between two hotel chains, but his past with the opposing counsel complicates matters.

title: Identity Crisis
summary: ofit. But Louis, anxious to make a good impression, inadvertently hurts the case. Elsewhere, Mike tries to contain a modern-day Robin Hood whose actions are damaging a client's business.

title: Undefeated
summary: Harvey takes on an undefeated lawyer from Boston during a class-action lawsuit.

title: The Shelf Life
summary: Mike questions the firing of an executive, whom Harvey dismissed at the request of a client.

title: Rules Of The Game
summary: n. Elsewhere, Mike and Louis try to settle a mogul's estate in the midst of family clashes; and Jenny worries that Mike is hiding something.

title: Dog Fight
summary: Harvey's efforts to free an innocent man hit a wall when he goes against the new district attorney, who seems more focused on the integrity of the system than justice.

title: She Knows
summary: In the Season 2 opener, Mike is excited to close a big case for the firm but doesn't realize Trevor confronted Jessica. Meanwhile, Jessica's former partner resurfaces, prompting Harvey to reconsider what he's willing to do to protect Mike's secret.

title: The Choice
summary: As Hardman makes it clear he's back to stay, Jessica tasks Harvey with helping shore up support for her within the firm - but Harvey's penchant for winning may create more enemies than friends.

title: Meet the New Boss
summary: Harvey bristles at Daniel's involvement on a lawsuit he's handling, but their battle to one up each other threatens the case, leaving Mike caught in the middle.

title: Discovery
summary: Travis Tanner returns to town and takes aim at Harvey, causing trouble that Harvey and Jessica must hide from Daniel. Elsewhere, Louis and Mike become closer as friends, but Louis' paranoia threatens to ruin the new bond.

title: Break Point
summary: Harvey balks when Jessica puts him in the passenger seat on a lawsuit that could make or break the firm, and his backseat driving may have far-reaching consequences.

title: All In
summary: Harvey's personal history with a client forces he and Mike to take on an unorthodox case from which they'd normally walk away. Also, Louis and Rachel team up to save a mutually beloved institution from ruin.

title: Sucker Punch
summary: As the fallout continues to reverberate from the pending lawsuit against Pearson Hardman, Harvey turns to a former colleague, with whom he has a thorny past, for help in proving the firm's case.

title: Rewind
summary: With the continuing upheaval at the firm, Mike and Harvey reflect back on how their past decisions have influenced their present situation.

title: Asterisk
summary: Harveyï¿½s tasked with closing the one person whose vote will decide Pearson Hardmanï¿½s future.

title: High Noon
summary: Personal issues cause Mike to drop off the grid when Harvey needs him during the fight for the firm.

title: Blind-Sided
summary: The firm tries to recover from the battle with Daniel, but Harvey must fend off another attack from a rival who seems to have a personal vendetta. Elsewhere, Mike and Louis face consequences for previous actions.

title: Blood in the Water
summary: The war with Daniel may be over, but the battle has left Pearson Hardman vulnerable, and Harvey must protect the firm from a rival whose attack seems as personal as it is professional. Louis and Mike are forced to pay the price for previous actions.

title: Zane Vs. Zane
summary: Harvey goes head to head against Robert Zane, Rachel's father, on a gender discrimination case that forces Rachel to confront her complicated relationship with her Dad.

title: He's Back
summary: With the resources of the firm stretched to the limit, Daniel Hardman returns with an outrageous lawsuit against Jessica.

title: Normandy
summary: Scott returns to complicate Harvey and Jessica's battle against Hardman. But this time, she's brought the full force of her British firm.

title: War
summary: Harvey's vision for the firm's future clashes with Jessica's when a British firm offers a tempting proposition.

title: The Arrangement
summary: The merger complete, Jessica's new partnership with Darby is tested when he assigns Harvey a high-profile client who faces the loss of her company if Harvey canï¿½t prove her innocence. Mike works to reconcile with Harvey and to manage the fallout from his revelation to Rachel.

title: I Want You To Want Me
summary: Louis offers Mike a case that could change his future at the firm. Harvey and Jessica team up to bring down an old nemesis who complicates their case to keep Ava Hessington out of jail.

title: Unfinished Business
summary: Cameron Dennis strikes back at Harvey by arresting one of his clients for murder. Katrina Bennett tries to win over Louis, who's still smarting from his rejection by Mike; and a British version of Harvey arrives to stir things up at the firm.

title: Conflict Of Interest
summary: rival businessman.

title: Shadow Of A Doubt
summary: Lines between the personal and the professional get blurred when Harvey and Stephen work together on Ava's case, and Mike invites Rachel to join him on a case that gets complicated when his secret falls in the line of fire -- with Rachel's parents.

title: The Other Time
summary: Cameronï¿½s continuing use of shady tactics on Avaï¿½s case brings up memories of why Harvey left the DAï¿½s office to work for Jessica. As Rachel visits law schools, Mike looks back on what cost him his one chance at a degree.

title: She's Mine
summary: Harvey clashes with Stephen over Avaï¿½s case, among other issues. Meanwhile, things are still tense between Harvey and Jessica as they strategize how best to defend Ava. And Louis enlists Rachel in his battle with Nigel over a broken contractï¿½ and heart.

title: Endgame
summary: Ava Hessington's trial begins, in the trial Harvey, Mike and Jessica confront Darby over Stephen's involvement as they continue fighting betrayal from inside and out. Louis and Donna try and level the playing field.

title: Bad Faith
summary: Louis manages to convince Jessica to let him handle the dissolution talks, doing so he officially starts the proceedings. Harvey battles with Scottie. Mike and Rachel's relationship moves up to the next level when he asks her to move in.

title: Stay
summary: isunderstands Mike and Rachel.

title: Buried Secrets
summary: Harvey gets caught up between Jessica and Scottie when he mixes business with pleasure. Mike tries using a client and their case to win against an old foe, however he also has to face issues from his past. Louis gets suspicious.

title: Yesterday's Gone
summary: Harvey see's both Mike and Jessica coming to him for support when issues from their past come back to haunt them.

title: Moot Point
summary: Harvey goes one-on-one against an old law school rival, with an assist from Mike, while he and Jessica try not to get caught in the crossfire of a battle that erupts between Louis and Scottie.

title: Heartburn
summary: While Harvey and Mike have unpleasant work to do for one of their biggest clients, Louis faces a huge challenge and Rachel tries to collect on an old debt.

title: Know When to Fold 'Em
summary: Harvey faces off with a relentless attorney who goes after one of his biggest clients, Mike has to make a big decision, and former name partner Charles Van Dyke has an ax to grind

title: No Way Out
summary: Things are anything but business as usual when Harvey and Mike find themselves at odds with a tenacious U.S. Attorney, Scottie and Harvey canï¿½t seem to get on the same page and Mike and Rachel clash over plans for the future.

title: One-Two-Three Go...
summary: Mike and Harvey fall out over some investment-banking strategies. Pearson works out that a former district attorney could be out for revenge against Harvey and the company.

title: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner
summary: Harvey and Mike find themselves going head to head, whilst Mike's relationship with Rachel only complicates things. Louis partners up with Jeff.

title: Two in the Knees
summary: Logan hopes that Harvey is aware his relationship with Mike won't get in the way of them winning the takeover battle. Louis and Jeff have a misunderstanding.

title: Leveraged
summary: Mike begins the takeover of Gillis industries. Harvey and Louis work against his efforts. Jessica and Malone meet with Sean who's hoping to bring down the firm with the backing of the SEC.

title: Pound of Flesh
summary: Rachel finds herself getting anxious about work, school and her attraction to Pearson Spcter client Logan Sanders. When Donna helps Louis out, she tries to get him to face up to one of his fears. Harvey and Mike call a ceasefire, but Sam gets involved and makes a accusation of collusion. Mike learns how ruthless his new partner can be.

title: Litt the Hell Up
summary: Harvey attempts to stop the takeover after Sean Cahill brings Pearson Specter client Logan Sanders in to be questioned. Louis attempts to come up with a way to make a name for himself after Mike insists on playing hardball.

title: We're Done
summary: Mike is left feeling stunned following the takeover battle. Rachel shares some upsetting news.

title: Exposure
summary: Mike and Rachel work together. Jessica and Harvey attempt to outmaneuver Sean Cahill.

title: Gone
summary: Sean starts a round of depositions for the SEC investigation, leaving the employees at Pearson Specter in danger.

title: This is Rome
summary: It is up to Jessica and Harvey to protect the firm from competition. Louis has to try and find a balance between personal and professional affairs.

title: Enough Is Enough
summary: Jessica attempts to please Louis. Mike is given grunt work so he will quit.

title: Respect
summary: After the Harvard ethics professor needs Harvey's help, Mike has to hide in plain sight.

title: Fork in the Road
summary: Harvey and Louis attempt to assist an out-of-town client who they have deep ties with.

title: Derailed
summary: Mike works on a humanitarian case that could jeopordize firm business.

title: Intent
summary: When Evan Smith brings new evidence nullifying the firmï¿½s victory against Liberty Rail, Harvey and Mike must scramble to save the case. But when D.A. Wolf comes after the firm, theyï¿½re faced with the real possibility of Donna going to prison for her role. Meanwhile, Jessica and Malone try to adjust to their new roles in each otherï¿½s lives.
